question: The Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail Ltd (ABFRL) has proposed to raise Rs.1500 crore from which company?
explanation:
Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail Ltd (ABFRL) has proposed to raise a sum of Rs.1,500 crore from Flipkart Group. This fund rising would be by means of preferential issue of shares.
The capital would be raised at Rs.205 per share. With this capital infusion Flipkart Group will own 7.8% equity stake in ABFRL.
